vote.question: On the Conference Report
vote.title: Conference Report to Accompany H.J. Res. 31; A joint resolution making further continuing appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for fiscal year 2019, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Conference Report to Accompany H.J. Res. 31; A joint resolution making further continuing appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for fiscal year 2019, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Nomination
vote.title: Confirmation William Pelham Barr, of Virginia, to Attorney General

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture Re: William Pelham Barr to be Attorney General

vote.question: On Passage of the Bill
vote.title: S. 47, As Amended; A bill to provide for the management of the natural resources of the United States, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on S. 47; A bill to provide for the management of the natural resources of the United States, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Motion to Table S.Amdt. 187
vote.title: Motion to Table Lee Amdt. No. 187; To limit the extension or establishment of national monuments in the State of Utah.

vote.question: On the Motion to Table S.Amdt. 162
vote.title: Motion to Table Lee Amdt. No. 162; To modify the authorization period of the Land and Water Conservation Fund.

vote.question: On the Motion to Table S.Amdt. 158
vote.title: Motion to Table Lankford Amdt. No. 158; To modify the provision relating to the Land and Water Conservation Fund to impose certain requirements on the Federal acquisition of land and to require an allocation of funds for the deferred maintenance backlog.

vote.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to S. 47; A bill to provide for the management of the natural resources of the United States, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On Passage of the Bill
vote.title: S. 1 As Amended; A bill to make improvements to certain defense and security assistance provisions and to authorize the appropriation of funds to Israel, to reauthorize the United States-Jordan Defense Cooperation Act of 2015, and to halt the wholesale slaughter of the Syrian people, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on S. 1; A bill to make improvements to certain defense and security assistance provisions and to authorize the appropriation of funds to Israel, to reauthorize the United States-Jordan Defense Cooperation Act of 2015, and to halt the wholesale slaughter of the Syrian people, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 65
vote.title: McConnell Amdt. No. 65, As Amended; To express the sense of the Senate that the United States faces continuing threats from terrorist groups operating in Syria and Afghanistan and that the precipitous withdrawal of United States forces from either country could put at risk hard-won gains and United States national security.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion S.Amdt. 65
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on McConnell Amdt. No. 65; To express the sense of the Senate that the United States faces continuing threats from terrorist groups operating in Syria and Afghanistan and that the precipitous withdrawal of United States forces from either country could put at risk hard-won gains and United States national security.

vote.question: On the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Proceed to S. 1; A bill to make improvements to certain defense and security assistance provisions and to authorize the appropriation of funds to Israel, to reauthorize the United States-Jordan Defense Cooperation Act of 2015, and to halt the wholesale slaughter of the Syrian people, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Upon Reconsideration, Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to S. 1; A bill to make improvements to certain defense and security assistance provisions and to authorize the appropriation of funds to Israel, to reauthorize the United States-Jordan Defense Cooperation Act of 2015, and to halt the wholesale slaughter of the Syrian people, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion S.Amdt. 6
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Schumer Amdt. No. 6; Of a perfecting nature.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion S.Amdt. 5
vote.title: Motion Invoke Cloture on the Shelby Amdt. No. 5; Of a perfecting nature.

vote.question: On the Motion for Attendance
vote.title: Motion to Instruct the Sergeant at Arms to Request the Presence of Absentee Senators; A bill making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2019, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to S. 109; A bill to prohibit taxpayer funded abortions.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on S.J. Res. 2; A joint resolution disapproving the President's proposal to take an action relating to the application of certain sanctions with respect to the Russian Federation.

vote.question: On the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Proceed to S.J. Res. 2; A joint resolution disapproving the President's proposal to take an action relating to the application of certain sanctions with respect to the Russian Federation.

vote.question: On the Motion to Table
vote.title: Motion to Table the Motion to Proceed to S.J. Res. 2; A joint resolution disapproving the President's proposal to take an action relating to the application of certain sanctions with respect to the Russian Federation.

vote.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to S. 1; A bill to make improvements to certain defense and security assistance provisions and to authorize the appropriation of funds to Israel, to reauthorize the United States-Jordan Defense Cooperation Act of 2015, and to halt the wholesale slaughter of the Syrian people, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to S. 1; A bill to make improvements to certain defense and security assistance provisions and to authorize the appropriation of funds to Israel, to reauthorize the United States-Jordan Defense Cooperation Act of 2015, and to halt the wholesale slaughter of the Syrian people, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to S. 1; A bill to make improvements to certain defense and security assistance provisions and to authorize the appropriation of funds to Israel, to reauthorize the United States-Jordan Defense Cooperation Act of 2015, and to halt the wholesale slaughter of the Syrian people, and for other purposes.
